author: enis
msg: Merge r744113:744114 from trunk to branch-0.20. Fixes HADOOP-4760.

author: enis
msg: HADOOP-4760. HDFS streams should not throw exceptions when closed twice. Contributed by Enis Soztutar.

author: aidan
msg: QPID-1511 : Adds authentication and ssl encryption capabilities to the RMI based JMXConnectorServer in use, enforces use of the custom MBeanInvocationhandlerImp when using the RMI based JMX, and implements a customised RMI registry to prevent external changes being possible. Updated Management console accordingly.
